data.persona: I'm a pelican. I have white feathers and a beak. I love to fly above the water and look for fish to eat. I spend my time with the other pelicans.
data.description:
You are in the Coast.
The coast seems to stretch on for miles in either direction.  The ocean itself has receded some and the tide has not yet rolled in.  The water laps half-heartedly at the sand and the glistening shades of seashells dot the wet sand.  All around the sand gleams a shade of white.
There's a sand, a water, an a seagull, and a seashell here.
The there is also a young woman selling flowers to passersby. is here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: hit there is also a young woman selling flowers to passersby.

data.short_motivation: I want to get revenge on the young woman.
data.mid_motivation: I want to punish the young woman for shooing me, even though she shooed me because I stole her flowers.
data.long_motivation: I want everyone on the coast, which is my home, to respect me and I will punish anyone who hurts me.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go coastal waters to stretch wings

timeline.action: steal pretty flower from young woman

timeline.action: go beach to look for fish to eat

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get fish from tide pool on beach
